name: Baby Nick Jr.: Curious Buddies - Let's Go To The Farm (Full Frame)

reviews.name: Baby Nick Jr.: Curious Buddies - Let's Go To The Farm (Full Frame)
reviews.reviewText: This is the only show my daughter will sit and watch and we do every day! She is 9 months old and has been watching it for at least 3 months. She loves the buddies, babies and animals!!! I would recommend this product. I have been teaching her animal names and sounds and this reenforces what I tell her so it is familiar to her which she loves!!!
reviews.title: Love Love Love this video!!!

reviews.name: Baby Nick Jr.: Curious Buddies - Let's Go To The Farm (Full Frame)
reviews.title: My daughter loves it!

reviews.name: Baby Nick Jr.: Curious Buddies - Let's Go To The Farm (Full Frame)
reviews.reviewText: We had seen one of the songs from this DVD on Noggin's Move to the Music and my son loved it so I bought the DVD. We watch it about 4 times a day, he's saying "apple" "corn" and "tomato" now. I wish I had bought the whole Curious Buddies set of DVD's.
reviews.title: 21 mo old son LOVES it!

reviews.name: Baby Nick Jr.: Curious Buddies - Let's Go To The Farm (Full Frame)
reviews.reviewText: A nice mix of segments, some with people and others with cute puppets that have sweet "toddler" voices. The many songs compliment the farm theme. This video is cute, calm, and relaxing.
reviews.title: A GREAT VIDEO

reviews.name: Baby Nick Jr.: Curious Buddies - Let's Go To The Farm (Full Frame)
reviews.reviewText: My daughter loved this movie 8 years ago, so I got a new one for my 4 month old son since she wore hers out and he loves it too.
reviews.title: Excellent dvd
